entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 8:06 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:06 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
